subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2008)
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Olympic gold medalist Paul Hamm will need at least four weeks to recover from a broken bone in his right hand, but his goal of defending his all-around title is far from doomed.
snippet: Olympic gold medalist Paul Hamm will need at least four weeks to recover from a broken bone in his right hand, but his goal of defending his all-around title is far from doomed.
